    How to get the SupplyChain365 extension

    Installing the SupplyChain365 extension:

    Go to the Microsoft Edge browser. Login to Business Central. In Business Central click on the search icon or press Alt+Q and type: 'extension marketplace'. The AppSource page will be opened with a list of all available apps for Business Central. Alternatively, you can go to the AppSource website and install the Extension from there. In the search bar enter: 'SupplyChain365' and press enter. In the search results the SupplyChain365 App will be displayed. By clicking the 'Free trial' button a confirmation window will be displayed. Click the 'Free trial' button again to install the SupplyChain365 Extension. SupplyChain365 has now been installed and is available for all companies within the environment.

    Watch the SupplyChain365 extension video:

    Why we love Cookies

    We use cookies to try and give you a better experience in Supplychain365.

    You can learn more about what kind of cookies we use, why, and how from our Privacy policy. If you hate cookies, or are just on a diet, you can disable them altogether too. Just note that the Freshdesk service is pretty big on some cookies (we love the choco-chip ones), and some portions of Freshdesk may not work properly if you disable cookies.

    Weâ€™ll also assume you agree to the way we use cookies and are ok with it as described in our Privacy policy, unless you choose to disable them altogether through your browser.
